author: newsr.in
title: Microsoft Demos the iPad Pro on Stage at Apple’s Live Event
text: If you’re trying to figure out the best way to promote your newly-unveiled device, ask Apple because they definitely have an answer that’s as shocking as it is effective. The Cupertino-based company has invited none other than Microsoft Office executive Kirk Koenigsbauer at its live event in San Francisco to demo the new iPad Pro, sho... »
